trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um painel em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> is a version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> designed specifically for use in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> é uma versão do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> projetado especificamente para uso em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The special features include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Os recursos especiais incluem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> can contain text or an icon that reflects the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> pode conter texto ou um ícone que reflete o status de um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> class to find, add, or remove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> classe localizar, adicionar ou remover <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> substitua e adicione funcionalidade ao controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e uso futuro, se desejado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> with various common properties set.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> com várias propriedades comuns definido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class that displays the specified image.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> que exibe a imagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class that displays the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> que exibe o texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class that displays the specified image and text.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> que exibe a imagem e o texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the action to carry out when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a ação a ser executada quando o controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class that displays the specified image and text, and that carries out the specified action when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados, além de realizar a ação especificada quando o usuário clica no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the action to carry out when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a ação a ser executada quando o controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> class with the specified name that displays the specified image and text, and that carries out the specified action when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> com o nome especificado que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados, além de realizar a ação especificada quando o usuário clica no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines where the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> is aligned on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina a localização em que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> está alinhado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment" />.

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Alignment%2A> property is affected by the setting of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O significado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Alignment%2A> propriedade é afetada pela configuração do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> common properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a sintaxe para várias <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> propriedades em comum, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Alignment%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates which sides of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> show borders.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica quais lados do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> mostram bordas.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides.None" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides.None" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> common properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a sintaxe para várias <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> propriedades em comum, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de borda do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle.Flat" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle.Flat" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> common properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a sintaxe para várias <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> propriedades em comum, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle" /> não é um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default margin of an item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a margem padrão de um item.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the margin.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa a margem.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área com tamanho personalizado de um controle.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> pode ser ajustado.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, que representa a largura e a altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> automatically fills the available space on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> as the form is resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> preenche automaticamente o espaço disponível no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> conforme o formulário é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> automatically fills the available space on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> as the form is resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> preencher automaticamente o espaço disponível no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> conforme o formulário for redimensionado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> property to `true` to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> to smoothly resize along with its container.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> propriedade `true` para habilitar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> perfeitamente redimensionar junto com seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> common properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a sintaxe para várias <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> propriedades em comum, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> propriedade.
